pvz.unit

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.level.SerializableObservable
        • pvz.unit.Unit
          • pvz.unit.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PeaBullet

    public abstract class Bullet
extends Unit
    This is an abstract superclass for all bullets in the game. It keeps track of when a bullet can move, and how much damage it does to a Zombie it hits. All bullets observe the level it is on, and does an action when level increments turn.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
